original_text: Marry, so that you have sons and daughters. Find wives for your sons to marry. Let your daughters marry too. Then they also can give birth to sons and daughters. Your descendants should become more and more, not fewer.
korean_text: 아내를 맞이하여 자녀를 낳으며 너희 아들이 아내를 맞이하며 너희 딸이 남편을 맞아 그들로 자녀를 낳게 하여 너희가 거기에서 번성하고 줄어들지 아니하게 하라

sentences.original_text: so that you have sons and daughters
Find wives for your sons to marry
sentences.korean_translation: 네 아들들을 위해 아내를 찾아 결혼시키라

sentences.original_text: Then they also can give birth to sons and daughters
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 그들도 아들과 딸을 낳을 수 있으리라

sentences.original_text: Your descendants should become more and more
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 자손은 점점 더 많아져야 하느니라
